name: 过滤蓝奏地址中的删字
synopsis: 过滤蓝奏云地址中的删字
detail:
/*

* @name: 过滤蓝奏地址中的删字

* @Author: ccy

* @version: 0.0.1

* @description: 过滤掉蓝奏地址栏中的删字

* @include: *

*

;(()=>{

window.addEventListener('load', () => {

if (location.href.search('lanzou') != -1 &

location.href.search('%E5%88%A0') != -1){

let url_r = location.href.replace(/%E5%88%A0/g,'').replace(/%2F/g,'/');

let url = 'http://'+url_r.substring(url_r.lastIndexOf('=')+1);

location.href = url;

}})})();
